CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymer PDTP-DT2BT exhibits the highest PCE of 3.12% , ascribed to the largest J SC = 11.43 mA cm^-2 with a slightly lower V OC of 0.54 V and a slightly higher FF of 0.57 than the other polymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

The entities in the paragraph are:

* PDTP-DT2BT

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material name", presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

The entities in the paragraph that do not clearly refer to "Material name" are:

* "J SC" (this refers to "Jump Scale")
* "V OC" (this refers to "Voltage of Composition")
* "FF" (this refers to "Fill Factor")

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

* "The" (as it is a general term that does not refer to a specific material property)
